abstractive.text: The project manager opens the meeting by stating that they will address functional design and then going over the agenda.

abstractive.text: The industrial designer gives his presentation, explaining how remote controls function and giving personal preference to a clear, simple design that upgrades the technology as well as incorporates the latest features in chip design.

abstractive.text: She pinpoints the main functions of on/off, channel-switching, numbers for choosing particular channels, and volume; and also suggests adding a menu button to change settings such as brightness on the screen.
abstractive.text_fr: Elle met en évidence les principales fonctions de marche/arrêt, le canal de commutation, les chiffres pour le choix des chaînes, et le volume; et suggère également l'ajout d'un bouton de menu pour modifier les paramètres tels que la luminosité sur l'écran.
